sentences.english: Residential carpenters erect all types of homes, including apartments and townhouses.
sentences.chinese: 住宅木匠会建造各式各样的房屋，例如公寓和市政厅。

sentences.english: Indexes cover all sorts of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 索引涉及各式各样的主题。

sentences.english: It's like a watch – there are various levels of intricacy .
sentences.chinese: 这就像手表，有各式各样的复杂程度。

sentences.english: Siamese fighting fish are available in a wide range of colors.
sentences.chinese: 暹罗斗鱼的体色各式各样，选择面极广。

sentences.english: She embellished her room with all kinds of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她用各式各样的花来装饰房间。

sentences.english: Complex of monasteries in Kotaik province.
We have a very diverse campus of a lot of different types of people.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个多元化的校园，充满了许多各式各样的人。

sentences.english: Tracy: On the night of the festival, people go on streets with a variety of lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 元宵节的晚上，人们会提着各式各样的灯笼上街。

sentences.english: Here, can enjoy the sundry product that be not involuntary discharge of urine.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，可以欣赏到各式各样的非遗产品。

sentences.english: Various kinds of sculptured handicrafts will be shown at this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 展览会将展出各式各样的圆雕工艺品。

sentences.english: There were dainties of every kind on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上放著各式各样的精美食品。

sentences.english: All kinds of gifts were rained down upon the children.
sentences.chinese: 各式各样的礼品纷纷送到孩子们手里。

sentences.english: Amazing special effects bring a vast variety of fantastic creatures to life.
sentences.chinese: 惊人特效让各式各样珍禽异兽重生。

sentences.english: There are all kinds of friendship, along a wide spectrum of intimacy.
sentences.chinese: 按亲密度分，有各式各样的友谊。

sentences.english: Recent years have seen an explosion of environmentally-friendly vegetarian foods.
sentences.chinese: 近几年涌现出各式各样的环保素食品。

sentences.english: Over the past few years they have been working on the various bits and pieces needed.
sentences.chinese: 过去的几年中，他们在各式各样的字节和片断中工作。

definition: lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of
all kinds of/all sorts of/every (different) kind of
glittering jewels to delight the eye (idiom)/fig. a dazzling lineup
everything that should be here is here (idiom); all one can think of is on hand/to have all one needs
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
